author: geirm
msg: Added support for Velocimacros. The are handled just like a PD.

author: geirm
msg: - added support to interact with VM factory in the same manner PDs are handled.
- removed the SKIP for DIRECTIVE and REFMOD2 whitespace, and sprinkled the requisite tokens
in the various productions.  It doesn't result in different ASTs, but the whitespace is available
in the token stream for accurate template reconstruction needed by VMs.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - set the template path in the generator so it can be accessed

author: jvanzyl
msg: - allow clients to get the the template path so it doesn't have
to be hardcoded in control/worker templates.
